name: Aim_Bot
description:
This Game is a Fast Paced Action Shooter game

Aim is to Shoot the red cubes in the game world for Points

Game Helps you to improve your Aim in FPS games

Controls for the game

W,A,S,D for movement

E to slow time

Space bar to jump

Left Mouse Click to Shoot, right Mouse Like to Aim 

---------Read Me---------------

This is just a prototype not the final game , this game is still in development and yeah this game is Endless
